name: Earth Clash - Tower Defense
description:
Welcome into the depths of the galaxy! Upgrade your weapons and outsmart your enemies in fast Epic Space Battles. Start battling against enemies from around the universe with Earth Clash!  

GAME LINK FOR GOOGLE STORE: Download Earth Clash HERE.  

BECOME ONE OF THE MASTERS OF THIS SPACE TOWER DEFENSE Choose unique Upgrades to your Defense Strategy and head to space for an Epic Battle!Pick the best Upgrades and destroy each battleship to lead Earth to victory in this Idle Tower Defense.

 

UPGRADE YOUR ATTACK AND DEFENSE SKILLS DURING BATTLES Choose from many different types of Upgrades and Weapons for the best attack and defense Strategy. Try different new dynamic combinations for powerful combos! Possibilities are endless!

 

LEAD EARTH TO VICTORY AND GRIND YOUR WAY TO THE TOP Clash your way to the top and find the best defense strategy to protect Earth. Engage in Epic Battles against your enemies and bosses to compete for glory and rewards! Loot your enemies to buy even more powerful upgrades and reach the highest score.

 

UPGRADE AND IMPROVE EARTH Unlock new Upgrades to create new defending strategies. Permanently buy Earth Upgrades for a more fierce Clash against your enemies.

 

OFFLINE TOWER DEFENSE - NO NETWORK CONNECTION NEEDED Enjoy leading Earth to glory even if you are offline across space in your own Battleship without an active internet connection.

 

See you in Space!

 

Support and feedback Are you having problems or want to get in touch? Reach us at bsquaredevs@gmail.com or just message us on itch.io!

 

Enjoy protecting the planet with Earth Clash!
